This project focuses on designing a Formula One Grand Prix Race Circuit in Chicago, Illinois. The design prioritizes sustainability, functionality, and aesthetics, incorporating the latest architectural trends and technologies.

The project involved extensive research, planning, and collaboration with stakeholders to ensure a world-class racing experience that aligns with the city's cultural and environmental values.
